## ICustomTipsJson interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This interface represents the raw custom-tips.json file which allows repo maintainers to configure extra details to be printed alongside certain Rush messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICustomTipsJson 
```
